title: Calories in a Panda Express Plate
meta_description: Discover calories in panda express plate, including macros, sodium, and tips for lighter optionsâ€”typical plate around 1,190 kcal with entrees and side.
h1: Calories in a Panda Express Plate
assumptions: Standard Plate: 1 serving Orange Chicken, 1 serving String Bean Chicken Breast, 1 serving Chow Mein. Values from official nutrition data, approximate.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by exact items chosen, portion size, preparation, and customizations. Check Panda Express app or site for latest info.

quick_answer.text: A typical Panda Express Plate has about 1,190 kcal, 48 g protein, and high sodium.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Swap Chow Mein for Super Greens side
Choose two grilled entrees (e.g., Teriyaki Chicken, Mushroom Chicken)

faqs.q: How many calories in a Panda Express Plate?
faqs.a: About 1,190 kcal for a typical plate with Orange Chicken, String Bean Chicken, and Chow Mein.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Panda Express Plate?
faqs.a: Around 48 g protein from the entrees.

faqs.q: Are Panda Express plates high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically over 2,000 mg sodium due to sauces and seasonings.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie Panda Express Plate?
faqs.a: Opt for grilled entrees and veggie sides like Super Greens to cut ~300-400 kcal.

faqs.q: Calories in Panda Express Bigger Plate vs. regular?
faqs.a: Bigger Plate (3 entrees + 1 side) adds ~300-500 kcal more than a standard Plate.
